hero.name: Marine Allavoine
hero.description: Front-End Developer on a mission to make the web more accessible.

about.aboutContent1: Hi, I'm Marine! With a background in Visual Arts and a previous career as a visual merchandiser, I decided to reinvent myself in web development and completed a Front-End developer training.
about.aboutContent2: My goal is to use my skills acquired throughout my journey to serve accessibility for all.
about.aboutContent3: My journey? An eclectic mix of art, commerce, and technology. I discovered my passion for digital accessibility, a quest that drives me every day.
about.aboutContent4: Welcome to my world, where aesthetics and functionality come together to provide unique and inclusive web experiences.

1.title: Booki
1.description: Landing page for Booki, an online vacation rental company. See more >
1.modalDescription: Booki, the company, requested a responsive single page for mobile/tablet/desktop. Solely HTML and CSS were used.

2.title: Oh My Food
2.description: Web application for booking menus from gourmet restaurants. See more >
2.modalDescription: Oh My Food is a reservation site for menus of top restaurants. It is responsive and built with Sass; external libraries are not allowed.

3.title: Sophie Bluel
3.description: Website for interior architect Sophie Bluel. See more >
3.modalDescription: Interior architect Sophie Bluel asked us to redesign her site, allowing her to add or remove projects once logged in. This project focuses on JavaScript and REST APIs.

4.title: Menu Maker
4.description: Web application for creating restaurant menus. See more >
4.modalDescription: Project management for the future Menu Maker application, enabling restaurateurs to create their menus. Notion was used, along with setting up informational monitoring and Agile methodology.

5.title: Kasa
5.modalDescription: Kasa website for renting vacation accommodations. Developed using React.

6.title: ArgentBank
6.modalDescription: Banking application developed with Redux, allowing user login and access to their personal data.
